home.title: Event Management System
home.subtitle: A system designed to help you organize, register, and check important events at your educational institution.
home.whatYouCanDo: What can you do with this system?
home.eventManagement: Event Management: Create, consult, and manage conferences, workshops, and seminars.
home.locations: Locations: Register and consult the places where events will take place.
home.contacts: Contacts: Manage the information of relevant contacts for your events.
home.eventDetails: Required details include title, guests, date and time, timezone, description, place, and reminder.
home.locationDetails: Required details include title, address, and geographical coordinates.
home.contactDetails: Required details include greeting, full name, identification number, email, phone number, and photograph.

eventoForm.title: Title
eventoForm.mandatoryFields: Please fill in all required fields.

events.errorLoadingEvents: Error loading events. Please try again.
events.title: Title
events.errorDeletingEvent: There was an error deleting the event.
events.errorUpdatingEvent: There was an error updating the event.
